did.unittitle: University of Connecticut, Women's Basketball Perfect Season Collection

repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

did.abstract: The collection contains publications, posters, awards and realia collected to document the UConn Women's Basketball teams' "Perfect Seasons."

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The University of Connecticut has had a women's basketball team since 1902.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use and Copyright Information
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

acqinfo.head: Provenance and Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The majority of the collection was donated by members of the UConn Libraries' staff.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains publications, posters, awards and realia collected to document the UConn Women's Basketball teams' "Perfect Seasons."

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the Reading Room desk.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], University of Connecticut, Women's Basketball Perfect Season Collection. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: [Items include: t-shirts, mug, bumper stickers, flags.]
